pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multiple Pairwise Comparison Tests // Multiple pairwise comparison tests on tidy data for one-way analysis of variance for both between-subjects and within-subjects designs. Currently, it supports only the most common types of statistical analyses and tests: parametric (Welch's and Student's t-test), nonparametric (Durbin-Conover and Dunn test), robust (Yuens trimmed means test), and Bayes Factor (Student's t-test).
